titleStmt.title: The present state and list of the children of His Late Majesty King Charles II his new royal foundation in Christ's-Hospital, presented ... to their Most Sacred Majesties, K. William and Q. Mary / by the Lord Mayor of the city of London, with the President and Governours of the said hospital, the first day of January, 1689/90.
titleStmt.author: Christ's Hospital (London, England)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"Children put forth apprentices to the practice of navigation, according to His Late Majesty's most gracious purposes in this His institution" p. [2]-[9]
"The forty children ... within said hospital, with their present age" p. [10]
